statements.select:
SELECT * FROM PM_ImportBill WHERE 1=1
C_CARNO like '%$C_CarNo$%'
(C_TAREWGTTIME between to_date('$StartTime$','yyyy/MM/dd HH24:MI:SS') and to_date('$EndTime$','yyyy/MM/dd HH24:MI:SS') or C_GROSSWGTTIME between to_date('$StartTime$','yyyy/MM/dd HH24:MI:SS') and to_date('$EndTime$','yyyy/MM/dd HH24:MI:SS'))
C_TAREWGTTIME between to_date('$StartTime$','yyyy/MM/dd HH24:MI:SS') and to_date('$EndTime$','yyyy/MM/dd HH24:MI:SS')
C_GROSSWGTTIME between to_date('$StartTime$','yyyy/MM/dd HH24:MI:SS') and to_date('$EndTime$','yyyy/MM/dd HH24:MI:SS')
statements.insert:
select SEQ_PM_ImportBill.nextval as ID from dual
insert into PM_ImportBill( I_INTID, C_CREATEUSERNAME, C_UPDATEUSERNAME, C_IMBATCHNUM, C_CARNO, C_GROSSWGTTIME, C_TAREWGTTIME, C_MATERIALNAME, N_GROSSWGT, N_TAREWGT, N_NETWGT, C_FROMDEPTNAME, C_TODEPTNAME, C_NETWGTMAN, C_GROSSWGTSITE, C_PondNo, C_Remark )values( #I_Intid#, #C_CreateUserName#, #C_UpdateUserName#, #C_ImBatchNum#, #C_CarNo#, #C_GrossWgtTime#, #C_TareWgtTime#, #C_MaterialName#, $N_GrossWgt$, $N_TareWgt$, $N_NetWgt$, #C_FromDeptName#, #C_ToDeptName#, #C_NetWgtMan#, #C_GrossWgtSite#, #C_PondNo#, #C_Remark# )
statements.update: update PM_ImportBill set I_PRINTNUM=#I_PrintNum# where I_INTID=#I_Intid#
